bibl.title: Archaeological Survey in the Eastern Desert Conducted by the University of Michigan and the University of Assiut: Interim Report.
bibl.note: Survey (1988-1993) of the Graeco-Roman sites: the connection of Coptos with Myos Hormos and Berenike, the connection of Edfu with Berenike.
bibl.seg: WRIGHT Henry T., Archaeological Survey in the Eastern Desert Conducted by the University of Michigan and the University of Assiut: Interim Report.

S.C. HERBERT and A. BERLIN, with contributions by D.T. ARIEL, T.V. BUTTREY, E. FRIEDLAND, M. LAWALL, R.W. REDDING, and H.T.WRIGHT, Excavations at Coptos (Qift) in Upper Egypt, 1987-1992. Kelsey Museum of the University of Michigan - University of Assiut = Journal of Roman Archaeology. Supplementary Series. 53 = Kelsey Museum Fieldwork Series (Portsmouth, Rhode Island, 2003) pp. 224-231, 3 cartes.
Survey (1988-1993) of the Graeco-Roman sites: the connection of Coptos with Myos Hormos and Berenike, the connection of Edfu with Berenike.
